{"id":983394278,"question_id":6,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1688167996,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/983394278/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        String[] whiteboard = new String[numRows];\n        for(int i = 0; i < numRows && i < s.length(); i++) {\n            whiteboard[i] = \"\" + s.charAt(i);\n        }\n        int idx = numRows;\n        while(idx < s.length()) {\n            for(int i = numRows-2; i > 0 && idx < s.length(); i--, idx++) {\n                whiteboard[i] += s.charAt(idx);\n            }\n            for(int i = 0; i < numRows && idx < s.length(); i++, idx++) {\n                whiteboard[i] += s.charAt(idx);\n            }\n        }\n        String r = \"\";\n        for(String w : whiteboard) {\n            if(w == null) break;\n            r += w;\n        }\n        return r;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
